books.title: Becoming a better you
books.displayName: Becoming a Better You: A Guide to Personal Development
books.author: Bishop Ayo Odunayo
books.description: The Shiba Inu is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog from Japan. A small, agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting.

books.title: How to be Happy and Stay Happy
books.displayName: How to be Happy and Stay Happy: Secrets of True Happiness
books.author: Bishop Ayo Odunayo
books.description: A guide on how to place your joy on things above. A great read on discovering the true meaning of happiness.
